    public class SquareDrawingToolToggleButton
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ToggleButton
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler
    ToggleButton that is used to select the square drawing tool.
    Author:
    Group Fingerpaint
